attributes.action: Legislate that all new build homes incorporate renewable energies such as pv cells and rain water recycling as compulsory
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If all new homes were built with a real view to incorporating sensible elements of renewable energy and recycling, the nations reliance on other fuels would reduce.  Little by little this will only help the environment and stimulate children to understand the issues better.
